welcome_message_body: Welcome to Joso, Japan! From its picturesque riverside views to its rich history and cultural heritage, Joso is a charming city known for its traditional Japanese charm. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Joso has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ibaraki Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ibaraki Airport handles the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Narita Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used by low-cost carriers and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A new terminal opened in 2020, dedicated to low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but users must re-login every 3 hours.
